A C H I N R T 
All Classes All Packages

A

attack() - Method in class Creature
Allows a creature to determine how much damage it is causing in this round of battle

C

Creature - Class in <Unnamed>
Abstract class Creature - The creature is the main class from which all other battling creatures derive.
Creature() - Constructor for class Creature
default constructor - this should never actually run.
Creature(int, int) - Constructor for class Creature
Create a creature with a given strength and hit point level.

H

Human - Class in <Unnamed>
The Human class implements a wrapper for the base Creature class with the following additions Implements a maximum/minimum strength for the creature type [20/5] Implements a maximum/minimum hitpoint total for the creature type [25/5]
Human() - Constructor for class Human
Constructor for objects of class Human - Note that the calling class does not need to know anything about the requirements of human minimum and maximum values The instantiating class asks for a Human and the human class is responsible for return a Human object with values in the appropriate range

I

isAlive() - Method in class Creature
Is this creature still capable of fighting?
isKnockedOut() - Method in class Creature
Is this creature knockedOut?

N

nextInt(int) - Static method in class Randomizer
nextInt is a static method designed to return a random number between 1 and maxValue, inclusive NOTE this is different than the behavior of the Random class default behavior which returns 0 ..

R

Randomizer - Class in <Unnamed>
A static utility class Singleton that maps random number generation from the range 0..limit -1 to the range 1..limit
Randomizer() - Constructor for class Randomizer
 

T

takeDamage(int) - Method in class Creature
takeDamage receives a value for the amount of damage to subtract from the current total of hit points
